title: MTGGoldfish
description:
Magic the Gathering decks, reviews and product openings! The official channel for MTGGoldfish. Visit us at http://www.mtggoldfish.com.

Upload schedule for Major Series:
Sunday: Meme or Dream? 
Monday: Budget Magic, MTGGoldfish Podcast
Tuesday: Arena Series with Crim
Wednesday: Against the Odds
Thursday: Arena Series with Crim
Friday: Much Abrew About Nothing
Saturday: Arena Series with Crim

videos.author: MTGGoldfish
videos.title: I Cheat on Transform and Flip Kefka on the Cheap  Against the Odds
videos.description:
What if you could flip Kefka, Sephiroth and Emet-Selch for just three mana rather than their absurd transform costs? 

Today's video is brought to you by Card Kingdom. You can pick up some Magic: the Gathering cards (and help support the show) at https://www.cardkingdom.com/mtggoldfish

► Read more about this deck (full article): https://www.mtggoldfish.com/articles/against-the-odds-i-flip-kefka-sephiroth-and-emet-selch-for-just-three-mana-standard
► View this deck with the latest prices: https://www.mtggoldfish.com/deck/7174108#paper

◼ Purchase this deck (paper): http://mtg.fish/JyVRd
◼ Purchase this deck (Magic Online): http://mtg.fish/6M0ny
